comment: It seems a number of you still don't understand why the President's tweet about LeBron James was racist. Perhaps I can explain, and take you through the basic reasoning. First: yes, Donald Trump has called many, many people dumb on Twitter over the years.

            :time (o / over
                  :op1 (m3 / multiple

                              :quant 1

comment: @DavidAmoyal @bubbaprog Uhhhh. No. Does anybody seriously believe that? I would think not. I just hate the current social media trend where we rush to label people racist on one hand, and defend deplorable comments on the other. There are terrible people on both sides but no one wants to admit that.
